channel.title: Axoloti as ableton style audio clip player w timestretching
channel.description:
Axoloti playing audio clips ableton style, with timestretching, different loops etc...did anyone ever do this?
I was trying out different granular objects (the one from johannes and js ) in order to get timestretching of audio loops but the results where always a bit to "foggy". Nice as an artistic granular colour but in a way destroying the loop...

item.title: Axoloti as ableton style audio clip player w timestretching
item.dc:creator: @JeromeB
item.description:
@JeromeB wrote:

Help -> Library -> Community -> gao -> sample -> rockafella.axh

[solved] Pd sampler.rockafella example on axoloti

Problem solved ! rockafella_test.axp (2.6 KB) rockafella.axs (15.9 KB)

Have fun !

Read full topic
item.source: Axoloti as ableton style audio clip player w timestretching

item.title: Axoloti as ableton style audio clip player w timestretching
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

there is a port of the PD rockafella patch to axoloti, it's in the forum somewhere, i have not tried it, but it might do something like that. time stretching in HQ usually means fft (phase vocoding etc.) which axoloti does not really excel at.

Read full topic
item.source: Axoloti as ableton style audio clip player w timestretching
